title: Keyboard not working both in game and not in game
body: win 10 Lenovo laptop. My keyboard stop working in game occasionally sometimes happens multiples times in one game. It didn't work even outside the game I couldn't even open task manager (mouse works fine) but this issue only starts when I am in game. Sometimes it happens towards the end of game and after game my keyboard was still not working both in game(chat) and outside(when I try to type using chrome or anything). The only thing I can do is shut it down and restart. I have no idea if it's a incompatibility problem or the game's problem.

replies.body:
Since your keyboard is impacted *outside League* as well, I'm not confident this is caused by League. I'd recommend [**completing a clean boot**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq3) to ensure a background application isn't exacerbating or causing this issue in the first place.

Let me know if that resolved this issue or not.
